Infrared remote control application for HTW air conditioners.

## Features
- All AC modes: Cool, Auto, Dry, Heat, Fan
- Fan speed: Auto, Low, Medium, High
- Temperature: 17°C - 30°C
- Toggle: Swing, Turbo, Fresh, LED, Clean
- Timer scheduling: 0.5h - 24h
- Settings saved to SD card

## Usage
Navigate with D-pad, press OK to activate. Back to exit.
